timeline.bodyText: Should fullcalendar be added to headscripts instead of an independent call?
timeline.author: profmikegreene
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,18 @@
+<!DOCTYPE html>
+<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml"
+      xmlns:th="http://www.thymeleaf.org">
+    <head>
+        <meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8" />
+        <link media="all" href="/library/skin/tool_base.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" />
+        <link href="/library/webjars/fullcalendar/4.3.1/core/main.min.css" rel="stylesheet" />
+        <script src="/library/js/headscripts.js"></script>
+        <script src="/library/webjars/fullcalendar/4.3.1/core/main.min.js"></script>

replies.bodyText: Not using fullcalendar now. I need to remove that. Good spot!
replies.author: adrianfish

timeline.bodyText: Is it best practice to redefine these here or pull them from the other property file where the tool itself is defined?
timeline.author: profmikegreene

replies.bodyText: Not sure about that. I'd have to pull in multiple i18n bundles in the widget picker just to get the tool names. One to keep an eye on, probably. I may add a TODO on that piece.
replies.author: adrianfish
